content: while searching the many wonderful swearing dishcloths on ravelry i found there weren t any that were charted - my preferred method for patterns like these to that end i made up my own chart & decided to publish it along with the corresponding written pattern as a free pattern to contribute to the urge to sometimes literally give a fuck to people this pattern works best with solid colour yarns in a tighter gauge i knit loosely and used a size 3 for my sample dishcloths whatever yarn you use aim for a nice dense fabric to show off the garter letters > **tester feedback** > > quick and easy > > just over an hour and a half project what s that mean for you a quick mindless fun project that results in something useful knit through that stress
